lpcodemirror-prefs-use-codemirror-phone: Use CodeMirror editor on phones (smaller than 767px screen width)
lpcodemirror-prefs-use-codemirror-tablet: Use CodeMirror editor on tablets (between 768px and 991px screen width)
lpcodemirror-prefs-use-codemirror: Use CodeMirror editor on desktop (larger than 992px screen width)
